headline: Leverage Shares by Themes Expands 2X Single-Stock ETF Lineup with Targeted Exposure to American Express and Freeport
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Leverage Shares by Themes is pleased to announce the launch of two new 2X single-stock leveraged ETFs, available for trading beginning February 19, 2026. Built for active traders seeking dynamic ways to engage with potentially high-growth innovators, these products are designed with the goal of helping investors amplify returns (up & down) while actively participating in the daily performance of American Express and Freeport-McMoRan. headline: US Financial 15 Split Corp. Preferred Dividend Declared
summary: TORONTO, Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- US Financial 15 Split Corp ("US Financial 15") declares its monthly distribution of $0.07275 for each Preferred share, or 10.00% annually based on the previous month end net asset value. Distributions are payable March 10, 2026 to shareholders on record as at February 27, 2026. US Financial 15 invests in a portfolio consisting of 15 U.S. financial services companies as follows:American Express, Bank of America, Bank of New York Mellon Corp., Citigroup,

headline: American Express (AXP) Valuation Check After Healthier January Credit Metrics
summary: American Express (AXP) shares moved after the company reported January credit metrics showing lower U.S. consumer card loans held for investment and slightly better net write-off rates, easing some near term concerns about consumer credit costs. See our latest analysis for American Express. At a share price of $346.24, American Express has seen a 12.91% 1 year total shareholder return alongside a 105.47% 3 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum has been strong even as the 30...
